title: Why can i not post in the Gameplay or General Discussion Forums?
body: It says I need to be level 7 to post a discussion , and i'm currently level 19 in game.... so I posted something on the forums and now it says i'm level 19 on the boards , but it still says I need to be level 7 to post a discussion?

replies.body: Sometimes it can take a bit for your board's profile to sync up correctly with your Summoner level. It looks like you're showing up as level 21 for me now, but let me know if you're still not seeing the right level!
